H0.text: What was the title given to the daughters of the Kings of Spain and Portugal who were not the heir to the throne. Duchess

H1.text: What was the title given to the daughters of the Kings of Spain and Portugal who were not the heir to the throne. Princess

H2.text: What was the title given to the daughters of the Kings of Spain and Portugal who were not the heir to the throne. Lady

H3.text: What was the title given to the daughters of the Kings of Spain and Portugal who were not the heir to the throne. Infanta

A4.text: Infante of Spain (feminine infanta; Spanish: infante de Espa√±a; f. infanta) is a royal title granted at birth to the children of reigning and past Spanish monarchs, and to the children of the heir to the Crown.

A5.text: By tradition, all other children of the Spanish monarch and that of the Prince or Princess of Asturias are titled infantes.
